description: This source file implements core functions for managing TCP socket data processing within the Ansc Broker framework. It includes functions for receiving data buffers, processing incoming packets, and sending outgoing data, specifically for the Ansc BrokerSocketTcp object.

methods.name: PVOID AnscBktoGetRecvBuffer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PULONG pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves a buffer for holding incoming data packets, returning a pointer within the buffer and setting the buffer size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscBktoRecv(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize)
methods.description: Processes incoming data packets, updating internal buffers, and invoking server query and processing functions based on the processing mode.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscBktoSend(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Handles sending data packets through the broker engine, ensuring the socket is open and not broken before transmission.
